entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gaspésie (Parc national)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:32 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cap-Chat 08:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -15.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -24
Dewpoint: -18.8°C
Wind: SSW 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain in the morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
